sentence.Network_en: 30 percent of reptiles, birds, and fish are currently threatened with extinction.
sentence.Network_cn: 目前，30%的爬行动物、鸟类和鱼类面临灭绝的危险。

sentence.Network_en: Since the birds interbreed they cannot be classed as different species.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于这些鸟进行杂交繁殖，不能把它们归为不同的物种。

encyclopedia.content: “Birds”是日本歌手德永英明的日语歌曲，该歌被香港歌手张学友翻唱改编成粤语的歌曲《太阳星辰》 歌名：Birds 中文歌名：鸟儿 歌手：德永英明 作词：大津あきら 作曲：德永英明 语言：日语 歌词 ﻿ さよならするために出逢ってゆくのなら どうして谁も皆なあんなに爱し合うの 违う梦选んで仆たちは 想い出の止まり木飞び立つよ 君の季节に幸せの円描けず今は目を闭じるけど 时には逢いたくて时には忘れたくて 涙に迷う

entry.def: A bird is a creature with feathers and wings. Female birds lay eggs. Most birds can fly.

entry.tran: 小妞儿（可能具冒犯意味）
entry.def: Some men refer to young women as birds. This use could cause offence.
Some people refer to the birds and the bees when they are talking about sex, especially to children.
Someone who is doing bird is in prison.

example.ex: They warned him that next time he'd find himself doing bird.
example.tran: 他们警告他下次他可能就要进监狱了。

entry.def: If you refer to two people as birds of a feather, you mean that they have the same interests or are very similar.
If an audience gives someone the bird, they shout loudly in order to show their disappointment or disapproval.

entry.tran: （表示侮辱）被竖中指/冲…竖中指
entry.def: If you get the bird or if someone gives you the bird, they make a rude gesture with their middle finger at you.
A bird in the hand is something that you already have and do not want to risk losing by trying to get something else.
If you say that a little bird told you about something, you mean that someone has told you about it, but you do not want to say who it was.
Some people use the phrase old bird to refer to someone and say what they are like.

example.ex: As usual, Wheeler, a wise old bird, got it right...
example.tran: 和往常一样，惠勒——一个非常聪明的人——又做对了。

example.ex: She was such a decent old bird.
example.tran: 她是一个如此端庄的女人。

entry.tran: 少见的人；稀有之物；凤毛麟角
entry.def: If you say that someone or something is a rare bird, you mean that they are very unusual.

entry.tran: 一石二鸟；一箭双雕；一举两得
entry.def: If you say that doing something will kill two birds with one stone, you mean that it will enable you to achieve two things that you want to achieve, rather than just one.

auth_sentence.content: Most live on small mammals, birds and reptiles.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most live on small mammals, birds and reptiles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most live on small mammals, birds and reptiles.

auth_sentence.content: So can birds of prey live alongside shooting interests?
auth_sentence.res_content: So can birds of prey live alongside shooting interests?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So can birds of prey live alongside shooting interests?

auth_sentence.content: There are various reasons that birds sing at dawn.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are various reasons that birds sing at dawn.

Sentence.sentence: He captures birds only to let them go when he realizes the cruelty involved.
